long_description: Enjoy the comfort and quick access of a sling bag. The REI Agility Sling offers a sleek, modern silhouette with outdoor-inspired fabrics and construction. Shoulder sling can be attached on either side of the bag to allow use by right- and left-hand users; sling back rotates forward for easy access without removal. Panel-opening zipper provides easy access to contents. Sleek and protective neoprene sleeve holds iPad(R) and most ebooks. Main opening has side gussets to provide wide-open access inside and to secure contents from spilling out. Includes fully featured organizer panel with multiple pockets for pens, electronics and small essentials. Side pockets stretch to increase capacity, providing a convenient place to stash a water bottle or keep small essentials handy. Carry strap has stretch mesh pockets for quick access to small essentials. Exterior zippered pocket holds small items. Main compartment accommodates letter-size documents and file folders. Interior zippered mesh pocket.
short_description: Enjoy the comfort and quick access of a sling bag. The REI Agility Sling offers a sleek, modern silhouette with outdoor-inspired fabrics and construction.
